 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפָה‎</span>]<sub>37</sub> **verb** ==look out or about, spy keep watch== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Pi\`el ***hope***;; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> III. ***hope***); — 

**Qal**<sub>28</sub> ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצֶף בֵּינִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבֵינֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Gen.31.49|Gen 31:49]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***may*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***keep watch between me and thee*** (that the covenant be kept = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵד וגו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> v[[Gen.31.50|Gen 31:50]]); 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינָיו בַּגּוֺיִם תִּצְפֶּי֑נָה‎</span> [[Ps.66.9|Ps 66:9]] ***his eyes keep watch upon the nations; Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺפֶה רָשָׁע֫ לַצַּדִּיק‎</span> [[Ps.37.32|Ps 37:32]] ***a wicked man spieth upon the righteous***; [[Song.7.5|Song 7:5]] the town ***which looketh*** toward (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּנֵי‎</span>) Damascus; feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺפִיָּה‎</span> [[Prov.31.27|Prov 31:27]] ***she keepeth watch*** of (with accusative); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵי י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹפוֺת רָעִים וְטוֺבִים‎</span> [[Prov.15.3|Prov 15:3]] elsewhere as substantive ***watchman***, absolute<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹפֶה‎</span> [[2Sam.13.34|2Sam 13:34]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹפִים‎</span> [[1Sam.14.16|1Sam 14:16]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹפָיו‎</span> [[Isa.56.10|Isa 56:10]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צפו‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹפַיִךְ‎</span> [[Isa.52.8|Isa 52:8]] — [[1Sam.14.16|1Sam 14:16]]; [[2Sam.13.34|2Sam 13:34]] + 8 t. Samuel Kings, [[Ezek.33.2|Ezek 33:2]]; [[Ezek.33.6|Ezek 33:6]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.52.8|Isa 52:8]], so in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂדֵה צֹפִים‎</span> [[Num.23.14|Num 23:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); figurative of prophets [[Hos.9.8|Hos 9:8]]; [[Jer.6.17|Jer 6:17]]; [[Ezek.3.17|Ezek 3:17]]; [[Ezek.33.7|Ezek 33:7]]; [[Isa.56.10|Isa 56:10]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺפִים‎</span> [[1Sam.1.1|1Sam 1:1]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּפִי‎</span>; ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפוּ‎</span> (Manuscripts and [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפוּי‎</span>), [[Job.15.22|Job 15:22]] ***spied out*** (and brought) ***to*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֵי‎</span>) the sword (Em [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 29</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפוּן‎</span> compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]). ***Pi\`el*** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִפִּינוּ‎</span> [[Lam.4.17|Lam 4:17]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲצַפֶּה‎</span> [[Mic.7.7|Mic 7:7]] +; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַפֵּה‎</span> [[Nah.2.2|Nah 2:2]], feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַפִּי‎</span> [[Jer.48.19|Jer 48:19]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַפֶּה‎</span> [[1Sam.4.13|1Sam 4:13]]; [[Isa.21.6|Isa 21:6]] plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַפֶּיךָ‎</span> [[Mic.7.4|Mic 7:4]] — ***watch*** (***closely***), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלרֶּֿרֶךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמְדִי וְצ‎</span> [[Jer.48.19|Jer 48:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶֿרֶךְ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[Nah.2.2|Nah 2:2]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> of person expected [[Lam.4.17|Lam 4:17]] figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲצַפֶּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּי‎</span> [[Mic.7.7|Mic 7:7]] absolute literal [[1Sam.4.13|1Sam 4:13]] figurative [[Hab.2.1|Hab 2:1]] ***I will look forth***, to see (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְאוֺת‎</span>) what he will say; [[Ps.5.4|Ps 5:4]] ***I will look out*** (expectantly); participle as noun = ***watchman*** [[Isa.21.6|Isa 21:6]]; [[Mic.7.4|Mic 7:4]].
